title: Video: Eddi Front – Superhero Style (Black Cab Sessions)
body:
Longtime CitR favourite **Eddi Front** has hooked up with the innovative video website [Black Cab Sessions](http://www.blackcabsessions.com/) for this stunning rendition of EP track _Superhero Style_. Perfectly suited to her low-key, sultry musings, and the intimate environment providing a stark contrast to her classical good looks; her unique voice and songwriting talent ties the entire session together rather sweetly. Check it out below.

[Black Cab Sessions – Eddi Front](http://vimeo.com/54142097) from [Black Cab Sessions](http://vimeo.com/blackcabsessions) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
